parameters.query: SELECT client_id, content, timestamp, direction FROM gynprog_support.messages WHERE client_id = '{{$json.client_id}}' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT {{ $json.limit || 20 }}

INSERT INTO gynprog_support.client_memory 
(client_id, conversation_summary, resolved_issues, pending_issues, key_topics, sentiment, last_updated)
VALUES ($1, $2, $3::text[], $4::text[], $5::text[], $6, NOW())
ON CONFLICT (client_id) DO UPDATE SET
  conversation_summary = EXCLUDED.conversation_summary,
  resolved_issues = EXCLUDED.resolved_issues || client_memory.resolved_issues,
  pending_issues = EXCLUDED.pending_issues,
  key_topics = EXCLUDED.key_topics,
  sentiment = EXCLUDED.sentiment,
  last_updated = NOW()
